subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet of France beat Yuri Schukin of Kazakhstan, 6-3, 6-4, to advance to the Swiss Open final in Gstaad against Nicolás Almagro of Spain
snippet: Richard Gasquet of France beat Yuri Schukin of Kazakhstan, 6-3, 6-4, to advance to the Swiss Open final in Gstaad against Nicolás Almagro of Spain
